The Smart Door Lock that puts you fully in control giving you the freedom to secure your home without the need for a key.</p&gt <h2&gtSend & Receive Virtual Keys</h2&gt <p&gtControl access from your smartphone</p&gt <h2&gtKeyless</h2&gt <p&gtSay goodbye to your keys</p&gt <h2&gtIn-App Control</h2&gt <p&gtControl access from your smartphone</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtEnsure the Z-Wave controller is close to the lock, around 1.5m.</li&gt <li&gtRemove the upper plastic cover from the lock, on the interior side.</li&gt <li&gtSet the controller into inclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtPress the reset 'R' button 3 times in 1.5s (3 quick presses), the lock will beep twice.</li&gt <li&gtUpon connection, the lock will play 3 notes.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtRemove the upper plastic cover from the lock, on the interior side.</li&gt <li&gtSet the controller into exclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtPress the reset 'R' button 3 times in 1.5s (3 quick presses), the lock will beep twice.</li&gt <li&gtUpon successful exclusion, the lock will play 3 notes.</li&gt </ol&gt
